statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE date_of_feedback > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_feedback ASC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating, date_of_feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY date_of_feedback DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC, date_of_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 2 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE DATE(date_of_feedback) = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating, date_of_feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY date_of_feedback ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_surveys;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT survey_date, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM feedback_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, survey_id FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating IS NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, department FROM ticketing_system WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback_text FROM feedback_surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM ticketing_system GROUP BY department ORDER BY ticket_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, department, ticket_status FROM ticketing_system WHERE resolution_date IS NULL ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback_text, survey_date FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id, survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT service_name, description FROM services WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, issue, status FROM tickets WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT service_name, description, rating FROM services WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY service_name
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 4 ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_description FROM ticketing_system WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, improvement_description, implementation_date FROM service_improvements ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE state='California' ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 AND age <= 40 ORDER BY first_name, last_name;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as total_customers FROM customers GROUP BY city HAVING total_customers > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) as full_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' OR phone LIKE '%-555-%';
